                "The expected variance of a portfolio is the weighted average of the expected variances of the investments within it, using the portfolio weights.", 
                "Short selling extends the set of possible portfolios.", 
                answer= "Diversification eliminates independent risks. The volatility of a large portfolio results from the common risk between the stocks in the portfolio.")
cat(q1,longmcq(q1_choices))
